prompt: i mean not heading all the content

parsedResult.explanation: The user requested that not all content be in a heading. I have transformed the template to remove the prominent heading from the 'hero-section' and instead made the 'hero-title' a more subdued, but still visually appealing, element. The 'features-title' and 'specs-title' have also been slightly de-emphasized to create a less header-heavy experience. The overall tone remains futuristic and engaging.
